EmailTemplate.subject: New Honeywell Technology Coming Soon – Sign Up for Insider Access
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/operationjetset?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTURFNFl6aGpOV1V4TlRneSIsInQiOiJrdEZodFRrWit4eDRHU3BrMnQ1OW5RY3BkckF1THJMOUxqaWJkdTJGakpVdmhXQisyaDhSUzY3b0xUblwvSWt5aTlrWHZPZmVNRWs1eTRpMmlhTHIrRmc9PSJ9#anchor]]> Who doesn’t like being first?
Dear valued customer:
We want you to be the first to know about exciting Honeywell technology coming for GoDirect Flight Services this summer!
The Honeywell team has been hard at work developing the latest technology to improve your flying experience. Sign up to be the first to know in July for an early reveal to something smarter, faster and more accurate that will help enable safer, more efficient flights! Don't wait to learn what it is.
By signing up to become an insider, you are also entering for a chance to win one of these epic prizes:
- Flying experience using the new technology with Honeywell’s flight test team on a test plane!
- 1-Year GoDirect Flight Planning subscription for FREE
- Honeywell swag bag of gifts
*Please see official sweepstakes details and rules HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/~/media/aerospace/files/contest-rules/contestrules.pdf]]>
SIGN UP FOR THE EARLY REVEAL <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/operationjetset]]>
Don’t miss out! Get the latest updates online and follow Honeywell Aerospace on social media with the hashtag #OperationJetSet.
Honeywell GoDirect Team
